revised_title: On the Periodic Nature of Hemispherical Sunspot Excess and its Connection to Terrestrial Magnetism
tldr: The author investigates the relationship between the period of hemispherical excess of sunspots and the 26-day period of terrestrial magnetism. By comparing the curves of excess sunspot area with daily mean horizontal force of the Earth's magnetism, the author concludes that there is no direct relationship between the two phenomena.
